title: Assignment with a Returned Value
content: Everything to the right of the equal is resolved before the value is assigned. This means we can take the return value of a function and assign it to a variable.
Assume we have defined a function sum which adds two numbers together.

exercises.instruction: Call the processArg function with an argument of 7 and assign its return value to the variable processed.
placeholder: // Only change code below this line

hint: processed should have a value of 2
You should assign processArg to processed
